headline.print_headline: Royals Beat Angels 8-3 to Finish Off ALDS Sweep
headline.main: Royals Beat Angels 8-3 to Finish Off ALDS Sweep

lead_paragraph: Almost an hour had passed, and the postgame party had moved from the field to the Kansas City clubhouse, where victory champagne was once again flowing. Yet as sheets of rain fell at Kauffman Stadium, thousands of celebrating Royals fans refused to leave.
